title: Amos: Judgement and Hope
description:
Readings from:
Amos 9:8, 10-15
Today's passages were read by Rory Green. Rory is a pastor, a husband to Brooke, and a father to Huck and one more coming July 2021. 
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
